casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Pearson, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Pearson (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 111.]

(No. 97-2488 Submitted August 19, 1998 Decided September 16, 1998.) *112Wendell R. Jones, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Rush (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 53, 697 N.E.2d 634.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.

Resnick, J., not participating.
